reviews.reviewText: The bar chair looks good and is sturdy. Strongly recommended.
Best product Must go with it Stability is good Quality is good Packaging was good

reviews.reviewerName: Defective product is delivered and I am having challenge in returning the product
reviews.reviewText: Defective product with challenges in returning

I needed a tall chair of a particular height for a certain purpose. I ordered the chair because the height matched my requirement. When I received the chair I found that the actual height is much shorter than the description. The legs were not square as shown in the picture. That was manageable for me, but I not the height. There was no refund policy. So, I requested for replacement. That process took time. The Amazon officials were transferring the call from one person to another person. However after couple of calls and several round of call transferring replacement was registered. Replacement was done smoothly. But the new chair was exactly similar to the earlier one in terms of height and design. From my experience of replacement request registration I didn't feel encouraged to lodge a complain. After all we have our jobs to be done. The chair is still lying idle at my office with no use. Sometimes it is used for cleaning ceilings etc. In some cases sellers are novice and they cannot comprehend the importance of specifications. So Amazon need to be careful that product specifications are correct.
I have taken 3 chairs for my bar counter....too gud üëç
Liked the bar stool. Have bought two . Just the right size.
Very good product

It is a pre-assembled product and complete finished product one. No need to assemble anything. Wood quality is very good. Walnut coating is looking very decent. Wood finishing is super. Also it is having perfect sturdiness. Comfort aspect that seating area should be little wider. Measured Seating width is 14.9inch whereas specified width is 16inch. Rest all worth to buy this product. Thanks to Amazon and seller. Bottom Bushes are not available on the chair legs.
Although the finish is okay, the legs section is very thin. The photos show it is about 40mmX40mm, while the actual product is only 40mmX20mm. Why mislead people with incorrect photos?
The photo appears as Strong foot sections, but fact is that the 4 foot members are thin not square , but rectangular. This makes the chair un- sturdy and unsafe for rough use.
Need to focus on comfort
Looks and finish are very good. It is a rigid product. I m using it in my bar.

It may be called as bar chair but it is really useful in kitchen. Eases the standing time for day to day cooking/veg cutting tasks. It is solid and very sturdy and hence safe.
Nice product!
Loved the product - you get delivered, what you see. It's sturdy, comfortable and the finish is beautiful. Would recommend to everyone considering buying a bar stool or a high chair.
